医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
使用木炉灶与胃癌风险相关研究人员在中美洲洪都拉斯农村地区进行了一项基于人群的病例对照研究，旨在研究土著居民使用木炉灶是否与胃癌（包括胃腺癌）风险增加相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Wood-cookstove-use-linked-to-gastric-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Wood-cookstove-use-linked-to-gastric-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58369122-4b1e-4b6f-9282-1186a78c6bcc Wed, 04 Oct 2023 09:34:00 -0400 Wood cookstove use linked to gastric cancer risk
研究强调了特应性皮炎患者的异质性，并证明了个性化治疗的前景研究人员调查了特应性皮炎（AD）的内型与表型关联，超出了其一般临床严重程度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-highlights-the-病人-heterogeneity-in-atopic-dermatitis-and-demonstrates-the-promises-of-personalized-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-highlights-the-病人-heterogeneity-in-atopic-dermatitis-and-demonstrates-the-promises-of-personalized-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf6ed4ff-1d3a-4cfb-a85d-7ceefbd95847 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 09:08:00 -0400 Study highlights the patient heterogeneity in atopic dermatitis and demonstrates the promises of personalized treatment
突破性技术有一天可以为脑损伤患者提供量身定制的修复牛津大学研究人员开发的一项突破性技术有一天可以为那些遭受脑损伤的人提供量身定制的修复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Breakthrough-technique-could-one-day-provide-tailored-repairs-for-people-with-brain-injuries.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Breakthrough-technique-could-one-day-provide-tailored-repairs-for-people-with-brain-injuries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3b21eeb-56dc-40bc-9647-9dbf2d0f8b7e Wed, 04 Oct 2023 09:00:43 -0400 Breakthrough technique could one day provide tailored repairs for people with brain injuries
研究表明 COVID-19 大流行对年轻人心理健康的影响一项全面的新研究显示，在新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 疫情期间，年轻人的心理健康状况恶化，抑郁症以及社交、情感和行为困难的程度比大流行爆发之前更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-demonstrates-the-impact-of-COVID-19-pandemic-on-young-peoplee28099s-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Study-demonstrates-the-impact-of-COVID-19-pandemic-on-young-peoplee28099s-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13e10059-0393-4bc5-b97d-e567797f7268 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 08:33:18 -0400 Study demonstrates the impact of COVID-19 pandemic on young people’s mental health
对俄勒冈州安乐死法的审查发现重大数据差距《BMJ 支持与姑息治疗》在线发表的一篇对过去 25 年过程的回顾发现，美国俄勒冈州的医生协助死亡的数据存在严重差距，因为参与人数不断增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Review-of-Oregons-assistance-dying-law-finds-significant-data-gaps.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Review-of-Oregons-assistance-dying-law-finds-significant-data-gaps.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4ebfdaa-5381-4da2-a6f2-f259e8105929 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 08:17:35 -0400 Review of Oregon's assisted dying law finds significant data gaps
对于女性来说，基于 HbA1c 的糖尿病诊断临界值可能过高研究人员比较了绝经前女性和同龄男性的糖化血红蛋白 (HbA1c) 水平的分布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/The-cut-off-for-HbA1c-based-diagnosis-of-diabetes-may-be-too-high-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/The-cut-off-for-HbA1c-based-diagnosis-of-diabetes-may-be-too-high-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=387d639a-9425-4ba0-a33d-9fad962fe99f Wed, 04 Oct 2023 08:11:00 -0400 The cut-off for HbA1c-based diagnosis of diabetes may be too high in women
新研究揭示心脏瓣膜置换手术的不平等一项大数据分析表明，英格兰各地在提供大型（主动脉）心脏瓣膜置换手术方面存在显着的不平等，女性、黑人和亚洲人以及生活在贫困地区的人接受挽救生命手术的可能性要小得多，发表在开放获取期刊 Open Heart 上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-study-reveals-inequalities-in-the-provision-of-heart-valve-replacement-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/New-study-reveals-inequalities-in-the-provision-of-heart-valve-replacement-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2069b12-cc47-45ee-be43-3fa2336a4a0b Wed, 04 Oct 2023 08:06:11 -0400 New study reveals inequalities in the provision of heart valve replacement surgery
优先考虑肺部健康：FeNO 如何帮助解决英国第三大威胁——肺部疾病普华永道受 Asthma+Lung UK 委托发布的一份新报告强调了英国肺部健康面临的令人震惊的危机。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Prioritising-Lung-Health-How-FeNO-can-help-to-tackle-Lung-Conditions-the-UKs-3rd-Largest-Threat.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Prioritising-Lung-Health-How-FeNO-can-help-to-tackle-Lung-Conditions-the-UKs-3rd-Largest-Threat.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=923e07c1-5181-4b58-b05c-3ece0b1a0bb5 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 07:15:00 -0400 Prioritising Lung Health: How FeNO can help to tackle Lung Conditions, the UK's 3rd Largest Threat
美元普通停车场的流动诊所对美国农村的医疗保健有何评价七月一个炎热的早晨，纳什维尔西北一条双车道高速公路旁的 Dollar General 的顾客似乎没有注意到这家连锁店进军移动医疗保健领域的迹象，特别是在美国农村地区。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/What-mobile-clinics-in-dollar-general-parking-lots-say-about-health-care-in-rural-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/What-mobile-clinics-in-dollar-general-parking-lots-say-about-health-care-in-rural-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61bcf10b-6fe3-46af-8097-aa78e8b13c44 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 06:44:12 -0400 What mobile clinics in dollar general parking lots say about health care in rural America
Trametinib：阿尔茨海默病的潜在治疗游戏规则改变者研究人员开发了 ATRIVIEW® 平台来筛选促进神经干细胞 (NSC) 分化的分子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Trametinib-Potential-therapeutic-game-changer-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231004/Trametinib-Potential-therapeutic-game-changer-for-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a569f2e-2940-4e3d-b945-37e079cfe374 Wed, 04 Oct 2023 06:05:00 -0400 Trametinib: Potential therapeutic game-changer for Alzheimer's disease
